meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>sun</radical> while holding a <radical>comb</radical> in a <radical>cage</radical> and sitting on a <radical>stool</radical>, you comb your hair in your <kanji>spare time</kanji>. Since you’re in a cage, you actually fashioned this comb yourself, so it’s a little messed up, missing a prong. You’re working on improving it in your spare time, and you also use it to style your mop.
readingMnemonic: So how did you get in this cage? Well, before you used to comb your hair in your <kanji>spare time</kanji>, you used to steal <reading>ca</reading>rs (か). You’d stolen many a car in your day, but you finally got caught in the act of stealing a car, and now you’re spending all of your spare time in that cage, just combing your hair.
